Vice Hierarch Zenya:
Relics of the Ancient Empire can be found by destroying Destroyer-phantom, Assassins, phantom, Sniper phantom, the Enchanted magician, the phantom.
Find 50 Relics of the Ancient Empire and bring them to me.
Sure! If you perform this task, You will be able to get the monsters a Pass in the Tomb, and if You need to get in Four Tombs, carefully store it.
